name: Vehicle Transporter Truck Game
description:
Drive trailer truck to transport multiple vehicles through city roads and off road hills. In this vehicle transport game you will drive multiple 4x4 vehicles like limo car, quad bike, jeep and Prado. As a extreme car transporter start your trucker carries by driving cargo trailer truck.

The big Euro truck is loaded with luxury cars so drive safely through city traffic and off road mountain tracks. After loading cars over trailer cargo truck then you will have to drive the transporter truck to the showrooms and unload the heavy vehicles.
